headerPosition.observed: The header text 'Tell us about yourself' is positioned too high and is partially cut off by the device's dynamic island / status bar area.
headerPosition.rootCause: Likely missing SafeArea padding or incorrect VStack alignment. Possibly using .ignoresSafeArea() or negative spacers.
headerPosition.expectedFix: Apply .padding(.top, safeAreaInsets.top + X) OR wrap the entire scroll content in a VStack aligned below the safe area. Remove any .offset that pushes content upward.

bioFieldSize.observed: The multiline text editor for the Bio field is extremely tall, taking up ~70% of the screen height.
bioFieldSize.impact: Feels unbalanced, dominates layout, causes next button to float in awkward center position.
bioFieldSize.rootCause: Fixed-height or flexible Frame(maxHeight: .infinity) applied. Possibly using geometry reader or unconstrained VStack.
bioFieldSize.expectedFix: Set a controlled height, e.g. 120–160px max. Include character limit (e.g. 200–250 chars). Add placeholder styling.

nextButton.observed: The circular next-button is centered vertically inside the oversized Bio field rather than below the field.
nextButton.rootCause: Button likely placed inside same container as the TextEditor, possibly using ZStack overlay incorrectly.
nextButton.expectedFix: Move button OUTSIDE the bio field container. Place below with proper spacing from design system tokens.

cityField.observed: City/Location field is too close to the bottom black home indicator. Not enough bottom padding.
cityField.expectedFix: Add bottom padding equal to safeAreaInsets.bottom + designSystem.spacing.large.

colorsAndDesignTokens.observed: Background uses a blue tint (likely fallback) instead of Mugshot's true onboarding background token.
colorsAndDesignTokens.expectedFix: Replace raw Color with design-system color: onboardingBackground or surfaceSecondary.

typography.observed: Title uses full-size H1 near the device top, causing cutoff and imbalance.
typography.expectedFix: Use a consistent onboarding title style (e.g. screenTitle / headlineBold). Add predictable spacing: 24–32pts below header before subtitle.

expected: Top section: Title + Subtitle aligned with proper padding
Bio label + Bio text editor (controlled height ~120–160px)
Next button placed BELOW the bio field, not overlaid
City/Location field with proper spacing below bio section
